sys_remote_update_set.description: This is a bi-rectional integration between splunk and Servicenow. This integration allows to create incidents in Servicenow based on outages and problems detected by Splunk. This also allows Splunk to pull down any data from ServiceNow tables and apply analytics to splice and dice the data.
sys_remote_update_set.name: Splunk-ServiceNow Integration
